titles.title: For As High As The Heavens

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
a
For as high as the heavens are above the earth
So great is His love towards me
For as far as the east is from the west
So far are my sins from me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord
His mercy endures forever and ever
Great is the Lord
His mercy endures forever and ever
